thread.title: Dawn French collapses in fits of giggles with 7-year-old dancer Balang on Little Big Shots
thread.title_full: Dawn French collapses in fits of giggles with 7-year-old dancer Balang on Little Big Shots

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Dawn French collapses in fits of giggles with 7-year-old dancer Balang on Little Big Shots
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Little Big Shots – hosted by Dawn French – started on ITV tonight. 
And viewers praised the kids on the talent show for being “too cute”. 
But it was seven-year-old dancer old Balang from The Philippines that really impressed viewers – and had Dawn in fits of giggles. 
Balang became an internet sensation when his parents uploaded a video of him dancing on YouTube when he was just six years old. Balang had Dawn French in fits of giggles (Photo: YouTube/Little Big Shots UK) Balang in the video that shot him to internet fame (Photo: YouTube/Little Big Shots UK) 
The video has now been watched over 29 million times. 
“You’re like a big sunshine machine, aren’t you?” Dawn said as she spoke with Balang using an interpreter. 
And before Balang even had a chance to show off his moves, viewers were already in love with the cheeky chap. The duo danced together (Photo: YouTube/Little Big Shots UK) Dawn refused to try and do the splits (Photo: YouTube/Little Big Shots UK) 
“This little boy is my spirit animal,” one viewer tweeted. 
“This kid is the best #littlebigshots,” another added. 
“Literally laughing crying at Little Big Shots,” a third fan wrote. Viewers agreed Balang was hilarious (Photo: YouTube/Little Big Shots UK) 
Balang then took to the stage dance to Beyonce’s Single Ladies and Crazy In Love. 
* Little Big Shots continues on ITV next Wednesday at 8pm Like us on Facebook
